songs.title: Better When You’re Gone
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]

[Verse] [?]
It makes me think about
Selective [?] memories, so I forget all the bad ones
Like I'm seventeen
I'd believed you're a good one
The reality is your love is my poison, uh

[Chorus] [?]
And you show up and make me feel so small
I'm better when you're gone
Better-
Only you can make me feel so small
-so much better

[Verse] [?]
Dressed up in the-
